title: Seiko Men's SSC385 RECRAFT Solar Chrono Analog Display Japanese Quartz Black Watch
feature: Men's recraft solar chronograph black ion finish
Black dial with gold highlights and silicone strap 100 M 100
description: Black ion-plated stainless steel case with a black silicone strap. Fixed black ion-plated bezel. Black dial with gold-tone skeleton hands and index hour markers. An Arabic numeral appears at the 12 o'clock position. Minute markers around the outer rim. Dial Type: Analog. Luminescent hands and markers. Date display at the 3 o'clock position. Chronograph - three sub-dials displaying: 60 second, 60 minute and 1/20th of a second. Solar quartz movement. Scratch resistant Hardlex crystal. Screw down crown. Solid case back. Case diameter: 43.5 mm. Case thickness: 12 mm. Round case shape. Band width: 22 mm. Tang clasp. Water resistant at 100 meters / 330 feet. Functions: chronograph, date, hour, minute, second. Casual watch style. Seiko Recraft Solar Chronograph Black Dial Black Silicone Mens Watch SSC385. Seiko Solar chronograph. Recraft series. This handsome timepiece is designed with a black ion finished stainless steel case and black silicone strap. No battery change required and powered by light energy, using Solar cells with high performance electricity generation. Energy-efficient Solar movement with 6 month power reserve once fully charged. The black dial features gold highlights, three subdials, luminous hands and date calendar. Chronograph measures up to 60 minutes in 1/20 second increments with split time measurement function. Screw down Case back. 100 meters water resistant.
